n0:createSxmlObject.n0:source: <VIEW xmlns="http://xmlns.oracle.com/ku" version="1.0"> <SCHEMA>%USER_NAME%</SCHEMA> <NAME>V_F1_CONSTRUCTORS</NAME> <DEFAULT_COLLATION>USING_NLS_COMP</DEFAULT_COLLATION> <COL_LIST> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>CONSTRUCTORID</NAME> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>INFO</NAME> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>NAME</NAME> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> </COL_LIST_ITEM> <COL_LIST_ITEM> <NAME>NATIONALITY</NAME> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> </COL_LIST_ITEM> </COL_LIST> <ANNOTATION_LIST></ANNOTATION_LIST> <SUBQUERY>select f1.constructorid ,f1.info ,f1.name ,f1.nationality from f1_staging.v_f1_json_docs ftab, json_table(ftab.f1_document,'$.MRData.ConstructorTable.Constructors[*]' COLUMNS( constructorId PATH '$.constructorId', info PATH '$.url', name PATH '$.name', nationality PATH '$.nationality') ) f1 where ftab.doc_type = 'CONSTRUCTORS'</SUBQUERY> </VIEW>
